titles.title: 2D Islets of Langerhans FTU for Pancreas, v1.0

subjects.subject: Pancreas, 2D Islets of Langerhans FTU v.1.0

descriptions.description: This functional tissue unit (FTU) illustration was created from anatomical structures and cell types listed in the ASCT+B Table [Pancreas v1.0.](https://doi.org/10.48539/HBM332.TMXM.592). Multiple histology atlases, especially “Human Microscopic Anatomy” (R.V. Krstić, 1994) and “Histology: A Text and Atlas” (Michael H. Ross, et al., 2003) were referenced. Especially helpful in determining the structure overall size and distribution of cell types was [(Da Silva Xavier 2018)](https://doi.org/10.3390/jcm7030054).

alternateIdentifiers.alternateIdentifier: Rachel Bajema 2022. 2D Islets of Langerhans FTU for Pancreas, v1.0. https://doi.org/10.48539/HBM344.CNNH.639. Accessed on May 6, 2022.

Rachel Bajema, Supriya Bidanta, Ellen Quardokus, Bruce W. Herr II, Katy Börner. 2022. [*HuBMAP CCF 2D Reference Object Library*](https://hubmapconsortium.github.io/ccf/pages/ccf-2d-reference-library.html). Accessed on May 6, 2022.
